idea: Volsonic Group is an Indian multinational conglomerate company, headquartered in Mumbai, India which is managed and owned by the Volsonic family. It was founded on Maharashtra Day 2022 and operates in sectors including consumer products, industrial engineering, appliances, leisure and hospitality. Our motto “Boom – Create Yourself” appropriately describes Volsonic ever expanding enthusiasm. Established in 2022, the Volsonic Group has its roots in India's Independence and Swadeshi struggle. We at Volsonic Group, value integrity over everything our company is built on TRUST, QUALITY and CUSTOMER SATISFACTION and our top priority is your satisfaction. Volsonic Group is known for its top notch products and services and we hope to serve you for decades to come Volsonic is the next generation world's leader in air conditioning, heating, and air treatment thanks to their unique, innovative products. Every design for a new product begins with an in-depth study of Indian lifestyle, region-specific habits and the unique environments in which we live and work. Our design and engineering teams keep your needs at the center of everything we do. Our innovation efforts are focused on creating products offering home & commercial appliances that improve the quality of life while protecting the planet and its scarce resources. We have developed ACs, Heaters, Dehumidifiers, Humidifiers, Air Purifiers and much more that are energy efficient, water saving, and environmentally friendly. Today, we aspire to have 1 billion consumers across consumer goods, appliances, industrial engineering, leisure and hospitality and many other businesses. Our people are at the center of it all. We take great satisfaction in creating a motivating workplace with a high performance culture. We are also committed to recognizing and appreciating diversity in our team.
name: Volsonic India Private Limited

idea:
We develop websites, invoice & booking software, and Mobile apps, we create graphics as per our client with logo designing, visiting cards, and letterhead. We also advertise our client product or business in the local area or universal based on our client on Google advertising, Facebook Advertising, and Snapchat advertising platform.




Another than this we have a plan to launch our own search engine with new features which will help students and normal users to get results or files as per their requirement. Also, we have planned to create our own in-house services which we can provide as saas services.




We want to provide unconventional digital solutions to businesses/individuals across the world.




Our Official Website:- Tech ADR
name: TECH ADR IT SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We offer customized freight forwarding and customs clearing services that are tried and tested. Our company is being headed by people who have been associated with the freight forwarding sector for many years. We are proud to let you know that our firm adheres to the national as well as international customs compliance. We also have all the necessary permits, accreditation and certifications that allow us to remain compliant, competent, and competitive. We have a customer-centric business policy and that too at reasonable rates.

idea: we “Khushi Multipack Solutions” are a trustworthy organization, engaged in manufacturing a comprehensive assortment of EPE Foam, Air Bubble Pouch And Bag. We also provide Fabrication Service. Quality being the main focus of our company and to maintain this we have implemented quality testing units. Our offered products are inspected and checked on various parameters at different levels of product development. We have a skilled quality controller with adamant approach towards quality while inspecting these products. Furthermore, we provide training to controllers at regular basis for enhancement of their skills and to keep pace with the latest quality norms.
name: KHUSHI MULTIPACK SOLUTIONS LLP

idea:
Curated by ‘The Yoga Institute’, with a 103-year-old legacy of yoga, Nispand aims to help you meditate, relax, and live mindfully. Nispand offers unique approach to practice meditation through diverse ways such as guided meditation, nature sounds, mantras, solfeggio frequencies, and binaural meditation to tune your mind into a perfect rhythm

With just few minutes of daily practice, your day can turn from one filled with stress to one brimming with joy, peace, and happiness

With over 500 clips, Nispand offers modern techniques with a unique approach to practice several types of meditation including:

Focus on breath

Understanding the causes of anger

Focus on thoughts

Self-love

Learning to empathise

Enhancing happiness quotient

Emotional independence

Body acceptance

Healing relationships

Deep sleep

Changing perspective
name: NISPAND

Projects including analyzing the urban and rural piped water distribution network with unique hydraulic system.
